title: Dream11 | SDE 2
content:
Education: B.Tech. from tier 2
Years of Experience: 4.5 years
Prior Experience: product based company
prev comp: ~42L
Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Dream11
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Mumbai
Salary: 55L 
Relocation: will sponsor movement of goods + 1 way flight to mumbai + 14 days stay at hotel
Signing Bonus: 11L (2 year full clawback)
ESOPS bonus (paper money): 48 units (don't remember the monetry value)
Yearly Bonus: nil
Benefits: 50% rent payment (over and above the base salary)
Other details: it's 4 days/week work from office.
